Crepecake

Recipe: ~ To Make Crepes ~ 1/2 cup warm water 1 cup milk 4 large eggs 4 Tbsp unsalted butter, melted, plus more to sauté 1 cup all-purpose flour 2 Tbsp granulated sugar pinch of salt

~ To Make Frosting ~ 1 cup (16 Tbsp) unsalted butter, softened at room temperature 12 oz sweetened condensed milk (from a 14 oz can – filled by weight) 8 oz cream cheese, softened at room temperature 2 tsp vanilla extract

Instructions:
